trans-unit.source: Defines whether opening balance should be used. <!--<70 char-->

seg-source.mrk: Defines whether opening balance should be used.

target.mrk: 期首残高を使用する必要があるかどうかを定義します。

trans-unit.source: Opening balance is the balance of all account entries just before the selected document was posted. The opening balance equals the closing balance that was carried forward from the previous document posting.

seg-source.mrk: Opening balance is the balance of all account entries just before the selected document was posted.
The opening balance equals the closing balance that was carried forward from the previous document posting.

target.mrk: 期首残高は、選択した伝票が転記された直前のすべての勘定エントリの残高です。
期首残高は、前回の伝票転記から繰り越された期末残高と等しくなります。

trans-unit.source: The opening balance is calculated relative to the accounting period specified in the <uicontrol>Document Range</uicontrol> filter.

seg-source.mrk: The opening balance is calculated relative to the accounting period specified in the <uicontrol>Document Range</uicontrol> filter.

target.mrk: 期首残高は、<uicontrol>伝票範囲</uicontrol>フィルタで指定された会計期間を基準として計算されます。

trans-unit.source: When <uicontrol>Use Opening Balance</uicontrol> is set to <uicontrol>Yes</uicontrol>, an aggregated opening balance is displayed for all entries posted to the account before the selected document was posted.

seg-source.mrk: When <uicontrol>Use Opening Balance</uicontrol> is set to <uicontrol>Yes</uicontrol>, an aggregated opening balance is displayed for all entries posted to the account before the selected document was posted.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>期首残高使用</uicontrol>が<uicontrol>はい</uicontrol>に設定されている場合は、選択した伝票が転記される前に勘定に転記されたすべてのエントリの集計された期首残高が表示されます。

trans-unit.source: When <uicontrol>Use Opening Balance</uicontrol> is set to <uicontrol>No</uicontrol>, no opening balance is displayed. Instead, you can see individual entries posted to the account since the beginning of the accounting period specified in the <uicontrol>Document Range</uicontrol> filter.

seg-source.mrk: When <uicontrol>Use Opening Balance</uicontrol> is set to <uicontrol>No</uicontrol>, no opening balance is displayed.
Instead, you can see individual entries posted to the account since the beginning of the accounting period specified in the <uicontrol>Document Range</uicontrol> filter.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>期首残高使用</uicontrol>が<uicontrol>いいえ</uicontrol>に設定されている場合は、期首残高が表示されません。
代わりに、<uicontrol>伝票範囲</uicontrol>フィルタで指定された会計期間の開始以降に勘定に転記された個別のエントリが表示されます。
